title: Stock market news live updates: S&P 500 rises amid strong jobs report: Nasdaq gains 1.58% - Yahoo Finance
content: Stock market news live updates: S&P 500 rises amid strong jobs report: Nasdaq gains 1.58%  Yahoo Finance
description: Stocks were mixed Friday morning as investors viewed a much stronger-than-expected jobs report as bolstering the case for the Federal Reserve to continue down its more hawkish monetary policy path.
